channel.title: [PI] Items Kept on Death - Help
channel.description:
[b]How i make it normally... when i try to check what i lose i always lose the nice items and keep the noobs items. I tried to wear same this set on another server, and they kept ags and bandos set, look what i keep, how i make it like the other servers...[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jSHtpIZ.png[/img]
